channel.title: Project EverPkz - Ideas
channel.description:
Hi
I Am Making A New Server, Which I Will Host Then Release For Download.
If There Is Any Ideas You Have Which I Should Put In My Server Post Here And I Will Happily Give You Credits For It, And Adminship.
Thanks.
Ideas:
- - - - -
Post Pl0x :P

item.title: Project EverPkz - Ideas
item.dc:creator: @shade_lv50 shade lv50
item.description:
@shade_lv50 wrote:

Ummm these are some other things I like in a server
~Pking that WORKS not some crappy halfbreed thing that sometimes funks out =]
~ABSOLUTELY NO white or black armour. it ruins it.
~NO crystal Bow Pking
~A Mod-Island#I have both of these in my server they rock =]
~Admin Castle #cos it makes the mods/admins feel like they own more and they encouragemroe people to play :o
~Get a auto-banner so when people ::noclip they get AUTOBANNED! but make sure you put in the ::help or something that they should not no-clip or they wont know

More to come
Shade

Read full topic

item.title: Project EverPkz - Ideas
item.dc:creator: @Death31 Death31
item.description:
@Death31 wrote:

  1. Barrows brothers, dont buy or a command to get barrows, make it so u need to kill the barrow brothers to get the armour/weapon.

  2. Make training on monsters instead of doors,haystacks or dummies.

  3. Use runes so you can only cast a spell if you have runes, so it wont be so ppl wont just constant tele and cause lag.

  4. SKILL CAPES! Must have skill capes with animations

Read full topic

item.title: Project EverPkz - Ideas

item.description:
@shade_lv50 wrote:

Hmmmâ€¦
1.Working Aincients is a must
2.Working tb owns with working specs.
DEFINATELY get working specs. Cos loads of people love pking =]
Quite quick levelling but not tooo quick.
3. Working 1V1 pking at EDGE
4.loads of commands
5. Try and get skills to work where you can earn money but not like click and instantly get like 20m.

  1. BUILD AN ECONOMY!
